thread.title: Body found in burned car in Hardeeville
thread.title_full: Body found in burned car in Hardeeville | savannahnow.com

author: Jasper County Sun Times
title: Body found in burned car in Hardeeville
text:
By Jasper County Sun Times A body was found inside a burned car near Purrysburg Road in Jasper County.
The Jasper County Coroner Martin Sauls was called to the scene around 5 p.m. Saturday, according to news station WTOC. Sauls was unable to discern many characteristics of the body due to the burns. The body will be taken to the Medical University of South Carolina for a forensic autopsy..
S.C. Law Enforcement Division is leading the investigation.
